New Records: Rohit Sharma took his ODI tally to 302 sixes
Rohit Sharma hit above AB de Villiers in maximums at white-ball World Cups
Key Match Events: Pakistan's collapse saw eight wickets fall for just 36 runs
Rohit Sharma's brilliant ODI record saw him smash six sixes
Post-Match Reflections: Babar Azam scored his first-ever half-century against India
Miscellaneous Highlights: India have now failed to win just four of their last 29 Cricket World Cup games
The head-to-head record between India and Pakistan at ICC Men's Cricket World Cups is remarkably one-sided
Others: Pakistan's previous worst World Cup collapse of seven or more wickets came against England at the 1992 tournament
